cast.name: 玛丽·蕾切尔·达德利 Mary Rachel Dudley
阿什琳·杰德·洛佩兹 Ashlyn Jade Lopez

introduction: TURTLE TALE is inspired by events that took place at the George C. McGough Nature Park in Largo, Florida - the story of JR the OWL as witnessed and told by the nature park's first inhabitants, 'THE TURTLES'. The turtles, HANK, RAFI and GOLIATH, and their community live in a beautiful pond with nice clean water, lots of food and are witnesses to all the events of the park as they get ready for another busy summer camp season, never suspecting what is about to happen at the park and to themselves.一群青少年、一个野生动物公园、一个夏天组合在一起，以海龟的视角发生的一段故事。
